Articles.Content:
I've been toying with the free version off and on for a while, but the mars rover inspired me to get the full version. Unfortunately now I have to wait for it to ship to me. IMHO, a direct download option would be a good idea.

Anyways, great game and hello all.

Hi Deaghaidh and welcome to the KSP community

You can download KSP from your store profile page, you need to scroll down to where it says Products Purchased and click on Download

Step by step instructions are here.

Edited August 8, 2012 by sal_vager

Nothing is shipped, you can download directly from your store profile. Follow these instructions:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/7149-Downloading-KSP-from-the-Store

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
For some reason, the game is not listed under products purchased I got an email from Paypal saying the charge went through though.

Then you will need to contact Store support from the main page. Make sure to send them all relevant transaction details so they can verify and track down the issue.

We have no access to the Store information from here on the forums, so this is why you need to contact Squad directly.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Yeah contacted store support, I'm sure it'll be straightened out soon.
Just thought I should say, support was very quick about fixing the issue, I had the game witgin 24 hours and everything is cool.
